content: greek mosaic beanie gauge 21 stitches and 31 row = 4 in mosaic stitch pattern needle size 6 or the size you need to achieve the desired gauge plus a needle one size smaller for the ribbing yarn dk weight yarn approximately 150 yds of main color 100 yds of contrast color sizes adult medium large note about printing there are 9 pages here there are two sets of charts designed to make it easier to follow them depending on whether your main color gray in the sample the color you use for the ribbing is lighter or darker than your contrast color you only need to print one set pages 4- 6 or pages 7-9 if you follow this pattern with similar yarn and the same gauge you will knit a comfortable relaxed hat the pattern can easily be made larger or smaller as long as you have a total number of stitches that is a multiple of 12 this will affect the stitch counts for your cast-on and when you decrease the top of the hat your total # of stitches divided by 12 is your multiple for example if you will knit 84 stitches in the mosaic pattern your multiple is 7 and you should cast on 8-12 stitches fewer for the ribbing than you will use for the mosaic part of the hat if you have not knit mosaic/slipped stitch colorwork before keep in mind that it has significantly less stretch than stockinette so be careful not to make your hat too small/tight with a smaller needle cast on 88 96 sts in main color mc gray in can i knit this with a single 16 the pictures make sure your cast-on is stretchy a tubular cast-on circular needle with dpns with one makes a nice edge old norwegian/twisted german is another good long circular needle magic loop choice join to knit in the round making sure that your stitches are not twisted on the needle s with 2 circular needles yes you can knit this or any other knit 1x1 ribbing for 1 ½ 2 inches if you want to be able to fold up similar hat with whichever method your brim knit 3 ½ 4 ½ inches of ribbing you prefer if you use a 16 circular switch to the larger needle and knit 1 round increasing evenly to 96 needle for most of the hat you will 108 sts * m1 k11 k8 * if you are knitting a different number of have to switch to any one of the stitches increase to a multiple of 12 84 96 108 120 132 144 will all other methods when you are work place marker to indicate beginning of round decreasing for the top of the hat join your contrast color cc black in the pictures and start mosaic pattern chart a round 1 with cc knit all stitches round 2 and all even rounds repeat previous round round 3 with mc k1 * s1
